title: Topology Browser
shortInfo: Topology Browser allows the user to browse the topology and view the Object Model of a selected object.
trafficDisturbance: Changes may cause a Traffic Disturbance
managedObjects: Changes may result in the deletion of some Managed Objects
otherObjects: Changes may result in the update of other attributes
sureWantToProceed: Are you sure you want to proceed?

persistentObjectNotFound.title: Could not find requested object
persistentObjectNotFound.body: We cannot find the requested object. It may have been removed or is not available at this time. Please try again later.

actionsFetchError.title: Error retrieving Actions
actionsFetchError.body: Unable to retrieve all Actions. Please try again.

dialog.title: Warning
dialog.content: You are about to switch away from Custom Topology. Any ongoing work will be lost.
dialog.secondaryContent: When you return to Topology Browser you will return to Network Data.
dialog.optionalContent: Are you sure you want to proceed?

dialog.title: Warning
dialog.content: You are about to switch away from Custom Topology. Any ongoing work will be lost.

MESSAGE_NOTIFICATION.MESSAGE: New notifications found. Please open the Notification panel to view the updates

NOTIFICATION_PANEL.EMPTY_DESCRIPTION: There are no notifications to display
NOTIFICATION_PANEL.ERROR_TIMEDOUT: Operation Timed out, please try again
